<title>Tour | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="Bruce Springsteen and The E Street Band's postponed tour dates have been rescheduled and announced for 2024." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://brucespringsteen.net/tour/" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Tour" />
<meta property="og:description" content="Bruce Springsteen and The E Street Band kick off their 2023 international tour with performances across the United States, before heading to Europe, and then returning to North America. The shows mark Springsteen and The E Street Band’s first tour dates since February 2017, and their first in North America since September 2016." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://brucespringsteen.net/tour/" />
<meta property="og:site_name" content="Bruce Springsteen" />
<meta property="article:publisher" content="https://www.facebook.com/brucespringsteen" />

	<meta property="og:image:width" content="1920" />
	<meta property="og:image:height" content="1080" />
	<meta property="og:image:type" content="image/jpeg" />
<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
<meta name="twitter:title" content="Tour" />
<meta name="twitter:description" content="Bruce Springsteen and The E Street Band kick off their 2023 international tour with performances across the United States, before heading to Europe, and then returning to North America. The shows mark Springsteen and The E Street Band’s first tour dates since February 2017, and their first in North America since September 2016." />
<meta name="twitter:site" content="@springsteen" />
<meta name="twitter:label1" content="Est. reading time" />
	<meta name="twitter:data1" content="1 minute" />

yoast_head_json.title: Tour | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: Bruce Springsteen and The E Street Band's postponed tour dates have been rescheduled and announced for 2024.
yoast_head_json.og_description: Bruce Springsteen and The E Street Band kick off their 2023 international tour with performances across the United States, before heading to Europe, and then returning to North America. The shows mark Springsteen and The E Street Band’s first tour dates since February 2017, and their first in North America since September 2016.
yoast_head_json.twitter_description: Bruce Springsteen and The E Street Band kick off their 2023 international tour with performances across the United States, before heading to Europe, and then returning to North America. The shows mark Springsteen and The E Street Band’s first tour dates since February 2017, and their first in North America since September 2016.
